title: Remote/Blended Learning Design Strategies in the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and competency in utilizing online learning tools
context.additional_context: A smartphone-centric accessible learning environment for strengthening social sector job competencies among working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design and apply three or more blended learning models suitable for pandemic situations.
Learners can develop strategies to enhance learner engagement by 20%+ in mobile-based LMS environments.
Learners can select and utilize two or more effective assessment tools in limited-technology environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
